entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
